text: Sutilizona theca is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Sutilizonidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in hydrothermal vents. ==References== * Warén, A. & Bouchet, P. (2001) Gastropoda and Monoplacophora from hydrothermal vents and seeps; new taxa and records. The Veliger, 44, 116–231 Category:Sutilizonidae Category:Gastropods described in 1989
title: Sutilizona theca
